description: This Java source file defines the PetController class, a Spring MVC controller managing pet-related operations such as creating and updating pet records within the pet clinic application.

classes.name: PetController
classes.description: Spring MVC controller handling pet creation and update operations for owners in the pet clinic application.

methods.name: populatePetTypes
methods.description: Populates the collection of pet types for forms.

methods.name: findOwner
methods.description: Retrieves an owner by ID, throws exception if not found.

methods.name: findPet
methods.description: Retrieves a pet by owner ID and optional pet ID, or creates a new Pet instance.

methods.name: initOwnerBinder
methods.description: Initializes data binder for owner, disallowing 'id' field.

methods.name: initPetBinder
methods.description: Initializes data binder for pet, setting a custom validator.

methods.name: initCreationForm
methods.description: Prepares the form for creating a new pet.

methods.name: processCreationForm
methods.description: Handles submission of new pet form, validates input, and saves new pet.

methods.name: initUpdateForm
methods.description: Prepares the form for editing an existing pet.

methods.name: processUpdateForm
methods.description: Handles submission of pet update form, validates input, and updates pet details.

methods.name: updatePetDetails
methods.description: Updates existing pet's details or adds a new pet to the owner.
